review: We have a B&B; and instead of placing and paying for cable boxes in every room.....we use these.  Our guests have access to HBOgo, and our other subscription channels, but they also get to watch their TV.  This allows them to log into their own Amazon Prime, You Tube, Netflix, BlockBuster, Pandora, and an array of other free channels.  These are awesome, because they let us have TV in anyroom at anytime without paying for a cable box.
